Title: Authorizes and directs the public service commission and the energy research and development authority to conduct a study to determine the possibility of closing a peaker plant in Brooklyn, NY
Summary: Authorizes and directs the public service commission and the New York state energy research and development authority to conduct a study to determine the possibility of closing a peaker plant electric generating facility in Brooklyn, NY.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing and directing the public service commission and the New York state energy research and development authority to conduct a study to determine the possibility of closing the peaker plant electric generating facility in Brooklyn, NY; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
